verses.esv: 17 Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation. The old has passed away; behold, the new has come.
verses.kjv: 17 Therefore if any man be in Christ, he is a new creature: old things are passed away; behold, all things are become new.
verses.niv: 17 Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation; the old has gone, the new has come!

verses.esv: 10 For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus for good works, which God prepared beforehand, that we should walk in them.
verses.kjv: 10 For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus unto good works, which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them.
verses.niv: 10 For we are God's workmanship, created in Christ Jesus to do good works, which God prepared in advance for us to do.

verses.esv: 9 But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for his own possession, that you may proclaim the excellencies of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light.
verses.kjv: 9 But ye are a chosen generation, a royal priesthood, an holy nation, a peculiar people; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light:
verses.niv: 9 But you are a chosen people, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people belonging to God, that you may declare the praises of him who called you out of darkness into his wonderful light.

verses.esv: 8:1 There is therefore now no condemnation for those who are in Christ Jesus.
verses.kjv: 1 There is therefore now no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus, who walk not after the flesh, but after the Spirit.
verses.niv: 1 Therefore, there is now no condemnation for those who are in Christ Jesus,

verses.esv: 12 But to all who did receive him, who believed in his name, he gave the right to become children of God,
verses.kjv: 12 But as many as received him, to them gave he power to become the sons of God, even to them that believe on his name:
verses.niv: 12 Yet to all who received him, to those who believed in his name, he gave the right to become children of God--

verses.esv: 21 For our sake he made him to be sin who knew no sin, so that in him we might become the righteousness of God.
verses.kjv: 21 For he hath made him to be sin for us, who knew no sin; that we might be made the righteousness of God in him.
verses.niv: 21 God made him who had no sin to be sin for us, so that in him we might become the righteousness of God.

verses.esv: 5 I am the vine; you are the branches. Whoever abides in me and I in him, he it is that bears much fruit, for apart from me you can do nothing.
verses.kjv: 5 I am the vine, ye are the branches: He that abideth in me, and I in him, the same bringeth forth much fruit: for without me ye can do nothing.
verses.niv: 5 "I am the vine; you are the branches. If a man remains in me and I in him, he will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

verses.esv: 15 No longer do I call you servants, for the servant does not know what his master is doing; but I have called you friends, for all that I have heard from my Father I have made known to you.
verses.kjv: 15 Henceforth I call you not servants; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth: but I have called you friends; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you.
verses.niv: 15 I no longer call you servants, because a servant does not know his master's business. Instead, I have called you friends, for everything that I learned from my Father I have made known to you.

verses.esv: 20 I have been crucified with Christ. It is no longer I who live, but Christ who lives in me. And the life I now live in the flesh I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me and gave himself for me.
verses.kjv: 20 I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I, but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved me, and gave himself for me.
verses.niv: 20 I have been crucified with Christ and I no longer live, but Christ lives in me. The life I live in the body, I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me and gave himself for me.

verses.esv: 6 and raised us up with him and seated us with him in the heavenly places in Christ Jesus,
verses.kjv: 6 And hath raised us up together, and made us sit together in heavenly places in Christ Jesus:
verses.niv: 6 And God raised us up with Christ and seated us with him in the heavenly realms in Christ Jesus,

verses.esv: 19 Or do you not know that your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit within you, whom you have from God? You are not your own,
verses.kjv: 19 What? know ye not that your body is the temple of the Holy Ghost which is in you, which ye have of God, and ye are not your own?
verses.niv: 19 Do you not know that your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit, who is in you, whom you have received from God? You are not your own;

verses.esv: 7 for God gave us a spirit not of fear but of power and love and self-control.
verses.kjv: 7 For God hath not given us the spirit of fear; but of power, and of love, and of a sound mind.
verses.niv: 7 For God did not give us a spirit of timidity, but a spirit of power, of love and of self-discipline.

verses.esv: 13 I can do all things through him who strengthens me.
verses.kjv: 13 I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
verses.niv: 13 I can do everything through him who gives me strength.

verses.esv: 26 for in Christ Jesus you are all sons of God, through faith.
verses.kjv: 26 For ye are all the children of God by faith in Christ Jesus.
verses.niv: 26 You are all sons of God through faith in Christ Jesus,

verses.esv: 17 and if children, then heirs—heirs of God and fellow heirs with Christ, provided we suffer with him in order that we may also be glorified with him.
verses.kjv: 17 And if children, then heirs; heirs of God, and joint-heirs with Christ; if so be that we suffer with him, that we may be also glorified together.
verses.niv: 17 Now if we are children, then we are heirs--heirs of God and co-heirs with Christ, if indeed we share in his sufferings in order that we may also share in his glory.

verses.esv: 20 But our citizenship is in heaven, and from it we await a Savior, the Lord Jesus Christ,
verses.kjv: 20 For our conversation is in heaven; from whence also we look for the Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ:
verses.niv: 20 But our citizenship is in heaven. And we eagerly await a Savior from there, the Lord Jesus Christ,

verses.esv: 4 Little children, you are from God and have overcome them, for he who is in you is greater than he who is in the world.
verses.kjv: 4 Ye are of God, little children, and have overcome them: because greater is he that is in you, than he that is in the world.
verses.niv: 4 You, dear children, are from God and have overcome them, because the one who is in you is greater than the one who is in the world.

verses.esv: 19 And my God will supply every need of yours according to his riches in glory in Christ Jesus.
verses.kjv: 19 But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus.
verses.niv: 19 And my God will meet all your needs according to his glorious riches in Christ Jesus.

verses.esv: 17 But he who is joined to the Lord becomes one spirit with him.
verses.kjv: 17 But he that is joined unto the Lord is one spirit.
verses.niv: 17 But he who unites himself with the Lord is one with him in spirit.

verses.esv: 18 We know that everyone who has been born of God does not keep on sinning, but he who was born of God protects him, and the evil one does not touch him.
verses.kjv: 18 We know that whosoever is born of God sinneth not; but he that is begotten of God keepeth himself, and that wicked one toucheth him not.
verses.niv: 18 We know that anyone born of God does not continue to sin; the one who was born of God keeps him safe, and the evil one cannot harm him.

verses.esv: 3 Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us in Christ with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places,
verses.kjv: 3 Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ:
verses.niv: 3 Praise be to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us in the heavenly realms with every spiritual blessing in Christ.

verses.esv: 27 Now you are the body of Christ and individually members of it.
verses.kjv: 27 Now ye are the body of Christ, and members in particular.
verses.niv: 27 Now you are the body of Christ, and each one of you is a part of it.

verses.esv: 12 Put on then, as God’s chosen ones, holy and beloved, compassionate hearts, kindness, humility, meekness, and patience,
verses.kjv: 12 Put on therefore, as the elect of God, holy and beloved, bowels of mercies, kindness, humbleness of mind, meekness, longsuffering;
verses.niv: 12 Therefore, as God's chosen people, holy and dearly loved, clothe yourselves with compassion, kindness, humility, gentleness and patience.

verses.esv: 7 In him we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of our trespasses, according to the riches of his grace,
verses.kjv: 7 In whom we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, according to the riches of his grace;
verses.niv: 7 In him we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, in accordance with the riches of God's grace

verses.esv: 5:1 Therefore, since we have been justified by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ.
verses.kjv: 1 Therefore being justified by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ:
verses.niv: 1 Therefore, since we have been justified through faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ,
